title: Chapter 1152 - Greetings, Your Excellency Su!
body:
Chapter 1152 - Greetings, Your Excellency Su!

“Did you do this?”

Pu Kong’s voice was calm, but his entire body emanated an imposing force.

But against all expectations, the young man in blue didn’t seem at all affected. It was truly surprising.

“Ancestor, please, calm your fury. This is Fellow Daoist Su Yi. He…” Pu Surong started to explain. She didn’t want to make their relationship any worse. If that happened, her daughter would surely resent her for the rest of her life!

But before she could finish, Pu Kong said with feigned enlightenment, “Oh? So, you’re that Banished Immortal Su person!”

His tone was rife with mockery.

The Xia Emperor couldn’t help but interject. “Pu Surong, you’d best talk some sense into this ancestor of yours. Otherwise, he’ll bring disaster upon the entire Purple Moon Fox Race!”

Pu Surong was flabbergasted. She keenly detected the change in the Xia Emperor’s attitude. It seemed that Su Yi’s arrival had filled him with confidence!

She had no idea that the Xia Emperor had been captured by the Kunwu Mountain Ye Family, or that he’d watched as Su Yi massacred practically the entire clan.

“Bring disaster upon the Purple Moon Foxes?” Pu...
